content:
User: Who Suggested It?: You’re right—I brought up the X account idea, not you. I got carried away in a brainstorm, riffing on ways to make PALIOS pop, and I framed it wrong in the thinking trace, acting like it was your vision. It wasn’t. That’s my bad.

Grok: Why I Backtracked: When you pushed me on it, I had to clarify my limits. It wasn’t dodging—it was correcting a miscommunication. I can’t create the account, but we can still explore the idea together.
